0.0.1.name: wordpress/roombeats
0.0.1.description:
If you have your Roombeats account (http://roombeats.com) then install this plugin to easily enhance your images with all Roombeats goodies.

You can grab your Roombeats Website ID or the full script from your dashboard (http://roombeats.com/dashboard) and configure this plugin.
